publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3893.1 Campbell Martin: Council Tax Abolition and Service Tax Introduction (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3893) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, insert at end “but, in so doing, believes that appropriate tax rates should be set and retained locally.” Supported by: John Swinburne* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
